title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 101.2 - Land requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 101.2 - Land requirements

State Regulations

Foundation or registered seed for the production of
certified seed shall be planted on land which has not grown or been seeded to
this grass during the previous 3 years unless the previous crop was of the same
variety and passed certification requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
101.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
